thread.section_title: Hotel de JoBo - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great hotel, staff, location
thread.title_full: Great hotel, staff, location - Review of Hotel de JoBo, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Joe C
title: Great hotel, staff, location
text: JoBo was perfect for my wife's surprise 40th trip and first visit to Paris. Location was great, staff was awesome, and the hotel was better than anticipated. We expected the rooms to be tight in any boutique hotel, and so wanted one with a lobby/bar situation. Didn't realize how private it would be, which was a big plus. Would recommend to anyone looking for a hip, low key hotel in a cool neighborhood.
